name: Leon The Self Conscious Vampire
description:
Leon the Self-Conscious Vampire is a game about a vampire afraid to see who he really is... stuck in a mirror factory. Dodge and avoid the mirrors and escape the factory, or die of shame! 

  This is my first game in Unity without the use of a tutorial, so be wary of the bugs that might be present. Use the WASD or arrow keys to move (including a double jump) and press escape at any time to go back to the menu. Please full screen the game, otherwise a portion of the screen seems to be cut off . Thank you for taking the time to view my game, and most important of all, enjoy!
